author: Luc Olinga
title: Drake Just Gave Bitcoin Its Biggest Pop Culture Moment Yet
description: From diss tracks to digital currency, the rap superstar is linking betrayal to Bitcoin’s wild swings.
content:
Bitcoin just got its biggest shoutout in pop culture yet from Drake.
In a surprise drop on the night of July 4th, the hip-hop titan unleashed his latest track, “What Did I Miss.” More than just anot… [+3291 chars]
